text: waqala lahum nabiyyuhum inna l-laha qad baʿatha lakum taluta malikan qalu anna yakunu lahu l-mul'ku ʿalayna wanahnu ahaqqu bil-mul'ki min'hu walam yu'ta saʿatan mina l-mali qala inna l-laha is'tafahu ʿalaykum wazadahu bastatan fi l-ʿil'mi wal-jis'mi wal-lahu yu'ti mul'kahu man yashau wal-lahu wasiʿun ʿalimun
